title: HOUR 3 - Chiefs & Rams?
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Chiefs & Rams?
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin continues the discussion of how difficult it is for a quarterback to bounce back from a poor outing as Browns QB Baker Mayfield did in Week 16. Plus, FOX Sports NFL Analyst Mark Sanchez joins Colin and discusses the NFL playoff race and what two teams could make the Super Bowl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
